lead_paragraph: Bernard Lapasset will not seek re-election as chairman of World Rugby in May so that he can focus his attention on spearheading Paris' bid for the 2024 Olympics, he said in a statement on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: World Chief Lapasset Standing Down to Focus on Olympics
headline.main: World Chief Lapasset Standing Down to Focus on Olympics
